experience.title: Summer Intern
experience.description: As an intern at IIM Lucknow, Noida Campus, under the supervision of Prof. Kaushik Ranjan Bandyopadhyay, I carried out the following tasks :1. Undertook a critical review of a research study on the feasibility of implementation of Thermal Energy Storage for the state of Rajasthan.2. Completed preparing and analyzing the business plan for a social entrepreneurial venture.3. Updated, compiled and documented information pertaining to a research study by Prof. Bandyopadhyay on Sustainable Transportation for India.

volunteer_experience.info:
Ripple effect is an initiative taken by the Entrepreneurship Cell, NIT Durgapur which is based on the concept of "Gift Economics". In this cafe we believe in generosity, hospitality, and serving our guests, wherein there are no predetermined price tags associated, one pays according to their wish.We observe that when such idea is implemented, the customers tend to pay more than what they might have actually paid, most of the times. All the profit generated from this cafe is used for theâ€¦
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Ripple effect is an initiative taken by the Entrepreneurship Cell, NIT Durgapur which is based on the concept of "Gift Economics". In this cafe we believe in generosity, hospitality, and serving our guests, wherein there are no predetermined price tags associated, one pays according to their wish.We observe that when such idea is implemented, the customers tend to pay more than what they might have actually paid, most of the times. All the profit generated from this cafe is used for the welfare of the children of The Hope Foundation, a society for handicapped and people who need special care and attention.
